(975x1+0)/1 mod 1024 = 975. (975x3+1)/2 mod 512 = 439. (975x9+5)/4 mod 256 = 147. (975x27+19)/8 mod 128 = 93. (975x81+65)/16 mod 64 = 12. (975x81+65)/32 mod 32 = 6. (975x81+65)/64 mod 16 = 3. (975x243+259)/128 mod 8 = 5. (975x729+905)/256 mod 4 = 0. (975x729+905)/512 mod 2 = 0. (975x729+905)/1024 mod 1 = 0.
